direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods generate text with a specified number of sentences, but paragraph generates multiple sentences joined by spaces.
Both methods involve generating a list of words, but sentence forms a sentence from these words.
Both methods generate strings of a fixed length, but fixedString uses sentences to achieve this.
Both methods handle cases where the length is zero or negative similarly.
Both methods access resources (words) to generate text.

enhanced_by.reason: Generating words is a prerequisite for forming sentences.
Paragraph generation involves multiple sentences, which can be used to test sentence generation.
Both methods handle string length constraints similarly, which can inform assertions.
